Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Kevin May
Reviews.Content: When used as an "indoor" camera as the description says, this is an awesome camera, espically for the price.  Please everyone, before eliminating products by the rating, sort by ratings and look at all the bad reviews, people will give 1 stars for thing like USP shipping error, product abuse (like with this product), shipping damage, or even a defective something (which could be rare, unfortunally they had one but how was the service getting it fixed, yeah it sucks to have that happen but don't give a bad review because of that, it happens with everything, even food you buy).  Maybe one day people will get it and stop leaving a bad taste in peoples mouths so they can quit bypassing good products because of false bad reviews (just like this product)!  Sorry for griping, it just aggervates me when this happens.

Reviews.Title: WASTE OF MONEY
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This item was a waste of money and time for me. I bought this camera, had it professionally installed and it worked well for a month. After the first month, it started doing some weird things on the screen. After about two months it was black on the screen while backing up. Bad Camera! Beware poor Quality!

ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: 1/4 Sharp CCD. IR Night Vision Dome Video Security Camera, With 48 Pcs IR LEDs, The Viewing Range Can Achieve to Be 131.2 Feet In The Night Time.
Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines. The Length of The Lens: 3.6 mm.
Adopt Low Power Consumption Board, with Stable Performance. Lens and Infrared Led Complete Isolation. Resolve The Fog and Astigmatism Phenomenon Effectively.
Material:Plastic.IR Lamps Wavelength: 850nm. Minimum Illumination: 0.000 LUX x F1.2(IR LED ON).
Applicable Scope: House, Hotel, Government, Various Indoor Environment.
ProductInfo.Name: 1/4 Inch Sharp CCD Night Vision Dome CCTV Security Camera with 48 Pcs IR LEDs, 420 TV Lines, 3.6mm Lens, 40 Meters Viewing Range in The Night Time, Indoor Used Surveillance Camera
